name: Social
description: Measure of social knowledge and experience, gained through experiencing social encounters of all kinds.
suggestedActivities: Do any activity that involves in-person socializing

name: Cooking
description: Measure of cooking and kitchen experience, gained through many activities related to the kitchen.

name: Tenacity
description: Measure of ability to stay focused and complete tough tasks.
suggestedActivities: Get out of comfort zone with reaching out
Having disciplined moments where you decide to not procrastinate

name: Emotional
description: Measure of emotional intelligence and recognition of own feelings.
suggestedActivities: Show empathy towards others in difficult times
Find time to meditate or journal to process emotions

name: Fitness
description: Measure of physical health and exercise routine.
suggestedActivities: Doing yoga or other physical activities

name: Learning
description: Measure of knowledge acquisition and pursuit of new skills
suggestedActivities: Practicing a new hobby or skill

name: Financial Literacy
description: Measure of financial knowledge and responsible money management

name: Self-Care
description: Measure of practices that promote physical, mental, and emotional well-being
suggestedActivities: Engaging in hobbies or leisure activities
